title: gazebo master doesn't close disconnected sockets

content.raw:
The following stress testing script can cause gzserver to fail after about a minute:
~~~
while gztopic list; do date; done
~~~
gzserver eventually fails with a "Too many open files" error. This can be adjusted with a ulimit command, but the issue is that the gazebo master doesn't close it's sockets. Running a `gztopic list` several times and then `lsof | grep gz` will show numerous TCP connections in a CLOSE_WAIT state.
